column4: hey guys.. this might be a stupid question.. but how do i stream a windows media player stream.. and rip it
wow.. really? what will it output to
you should be able to play it again
but will it just connect to the site again? or will it play in mplayer? or can i transcode it to another file..
it will download the data, you won't need to connect anymore
but do you know what format it will be.. and if it is transcodable?
not for sure, but it will probably be wmv or whatever the original was in
manpages-dev package will give you the manpages you want.  If you actually want a book, you should ask in ##c
can you ask an admin why I am banned?
I asked the channel if an op was available.  In the meantime, maybe some C coders in #ubuntu-offtopic can suggest some books for you
